scripts.clean: npm run clean:bundle && npm run clean:component && npm run clean:core
scripts.clean:bundle: cd packages && cd bundle && npm run clean
scripts.clean:component: cd packages && cd component && npm run clean
scripts.clean:core: cd packages && cd core && npm run clean
scripts.prepublishOnly: cd packages && cd bundle && npm run prepublishOnly
scripts.watch: npx concurrently --names "bundle,component,core" "npm run watch:bundle" "npm run watch:component" "npm run watch:core"
scripts.watch:bundle: cd packages && cd bundle && npm run watch
scripts.watch:component: cd packages && cd component && npm run watch
scripts.watch:core: cd packages && cd core && npm run watch
